trans-unit.source: Manages the composition of parts.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> class with the specified export providers.

An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> objects that provide the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*> to an empty <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.
providers contains an element that is .
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> class with the specified export providers and options.
An object that specifies the behavior of this container.

An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> objects that provide the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*> to an empty <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.
providers contains an element that is .
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> class with the specified catalog and export providers.
A catalog that provides <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref>.

An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> objects that provide the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*> to an empty <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.
providers contains an element that is .
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> class with the specified catalog, thread-safe mode, and export providers.
A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> object that can be accessed from multiple threads must set the `isThreadSafe` parameter to `true`.
Performance will be slightly slower when `isThreadSafe` is `true`, so we recommend that you set this parameter to `false` in single-threaded scenarios.
The default is `false`.
A catalog that provides <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> object must be thread-safe; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> objects that provide the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*> property to an empty <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.
One or more elements of providers are .
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> class with the specified catalog, options, and export providers.
A catalog that provides <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref>.
An object that specifies options that affect the behavior of the container.

An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> objects that provide the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.Providers*> to an empty <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.
providers contains an element that is .

Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog"></xref> that provides the container access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects.

The catalog that provides the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> access to exports produced from <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> objects.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> object has been disposed of.
Adds or removes the parts in the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionBatch"></xref> from the container and executes composition.
This method is the primary way of directly adding or removing parts from the container.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> will always maintain a stable, composed state.
Therefore, calling Compose with an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionBatch> is never necessary to start composition.
Instead, call the Compose method whenever you need to make changes to the parts available to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionBatch> can contain both parts to be added and parts to be removed.
Recomposition will take place only once for each call to Compose.
Changes to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> to include during the composition.
Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> class.
Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>.
The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> in an unusable state.

After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> was occupying.
For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>.
Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> object's `Finalize` method.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Returns a collection of all exports that match the conditions in the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref> object.
Implementations should not treat cardinality-related mismatches as errors and should not throw exceptions for cardinality-related mismatches.

For example, if the import requests exactly one export and the provider has either no matching exports or more than one, the GetExportsCore method should return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> objects.
The object that defines the conditions of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to get.
The composition transaction to use, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to disable transactional composition.
A collection of all the objects in this object that match the conditions specified by definition.
Gets the export providers that provide the container access to additional <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog"></xref> objects.

A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> objects that provide the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> access to additional <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects.
The default is an empty <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> has been disposed of.
Releases the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref>.

The behavior of this method may vary depending on the implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider> that produced the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> instance.
As a rule, non-shared exports should be detached from the container.

For example, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider> will only release an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> if it comes from a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> that was constructed under a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy> context.

Release in this context means walking the dependency chain of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> objects, detaching references from the container and calling `Dispose` on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> objects as needed.

If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> was constructed under a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy> context the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider> will do nothing, as the specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> may being used by other requestors.
Those will only be detached when the container is itself disposed.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> that needs to be released.
export is .
To be added.
Releases a set of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref>.
The behavior of this method may vary depending on the context in which the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> was constructed.
For more information, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer.ReleaseExport%2A> method.
A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to be released.
exports is .
exports contains an element that is .
To be added.
To be added.
Satisfies the imports of the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> object without registering it for recomposition.
The part to satisfy the imports of.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> object has been disposed of.
part is .
An error occurred during composition.
<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException.Errors*> will contain a collection of the errors that occurred.
